name: dry food for cats
title: Vital Balance Adult · dry food for cats · Salmon and cereals
description: Vital Balance dry food for cats Salmon and cereals Duactis - Adult

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Salmon (17%) (including head, bone, meat), dried poultry protein, wholegrain wheat (16%), corn, soya meal, wheat gluten, corn protein meal, pork fat, dried chicory root (2%), corn grits, dried beet pulp, minerals, digest (with added heat treated Lactobacillus Delbrueckii and Fermentum powder 0.025%), Yeasts.Composition: Salmon (17%), dried poultry protein, wholegrain wheat (16%), corn, soya meal, wheat gluten, corn protein meal, pork fat, dried chicory root 2%, corn grits, dried beet pulp, minerals, digest (with added heat treated Lactobacillus Delbrueckii and Fermentum powder 0.025%), Yeasts, Preservatives, vitamins, antioxidants.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 36000; Vit D3: 1100; Vit E: 460; mg/kg: Vit C: 140; taurine: 700; Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe:50 ); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 1.3); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 8.0 ); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 23); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn: 80); Sodium selenite: (Se: 0.075).antioxidants.Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 36000; Vit D3: 1100; Vit E: 460; mg/kg: Vit C: 140; Fe: 50; I: 1.3; Cu: 8.0; Mn: 23; Zn: 80; Se: 0.075.Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 36000; Vit D3: 1100; Vit E: 460; mg/kg: Vit C: 140; taurine: 700; 3b103: (Fe:50 ); 3b202: (I: 1.3); 3b405: (Cu: 8.0 ); 3b503: (Mn: 23); 3b605: (Zn: 80); 3b801: (Se: 0.075).antioxidants.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide : The recommended daily amounts should be adjusted to weather conditions, the cat’s level of activity and its physical condition. Clean, fresh drinking water should be available at all times. If you feed PURINA ONE for the first time, we recommend to make the change gradually by mixing an increasing amount of PURINA ONE with your cat’s current food for 7 days period to allow your cat’s digestive system to adapt to the change.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Die empfohlenen täglichen Mengen sollten sich je nach Wetter,  dem Aktivitätslevel der Katze und ihrem physischen Allgemeinzustand richten. Sauberes,  frisches Trinkwasser sollte jederzeit zur Verfügung stehen.
